trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Because I Have Willed It
trans-unit.target: Because I Have Willed It

trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·2★ | Behold My Grandeur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Behold My Grandeur
trans-unit.target: Behold My Grandeur

trans-unit.resname: OE01·2★ | Behold My Grandeur | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool. When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool. When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bow to My Command
trans-unit.target: Bow to My Command

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·4★ | Choose Your Demise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Choose Your Demise
trans-unit.target: Choose Your Demise

trans-unit.resname: OE01·4★ | Choose Your Demise | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·5★ | Delight in the Hunt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Delight in the Hunt
trans-unit.target: Delight in the Hunt

trans-unit.resname: OE01·5★ | Delight in the Hunt | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·5★ | Delight in the Hunt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Pain is a delusion of the weak. I'll demonstrate."
trans-unit.target: "Pain is a delusion of the weak. I'll demonstrate."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·6★ | Every Dream a Nightmare | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Every Dream a Nightmare
trans-unit.target: Every Dream a Nightmare

trans-unit.resname: OE01·6★ | Every Dream a Nightmare | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·6★ | Every Dream a Nightmare | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."
trans-unit.target: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·7★ | For Each of You, a Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: For Each of You, a Gift
trans-unit.target: For Each of You, a Gift

trans-unit.resname: OE01·7★ | For Each of You, a Gift | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·7★ | For Each of You, a Gift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving."
trans-unit.target: "My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·8★ | Know Evil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Know Evil
trans-unit.target: Know Evil

trans-unit.resname: OE01·8★ | Know Evil | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't target any player more than once.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't target any player more than once.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·9★ | Make Yourself Useful | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Make Yourself Useful
trans-unit.target: Make Yourself Useful

trans-unit.resname: OE01·9★ | Make Yourself Useful | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·9★ | Make Yourself Useful | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To think you've spent years honing your body only to die like this."
trans-unit.target: "To think you've spent years honing your body only to die like this."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·10★ | The Mighty Will Fall | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Mighty Will Fall
trans-unit.target: The Mighty Will Fall

trans-unit.resname: OE01·10★ | The Mighty Will Fall | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·10★ | The Mighty Will Fall | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Cry out for your comrades so that they may join you in misery."
trans-unit.target: "Cry out for your comrades so that they may join you in misery."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Forces Are Innumerable
trans-unit.target: My Forces Are Innumerable

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Laughter Echoes
trans-unit.target: My Laughter Echoes

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself."
trans-unit.target: "Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·13★ | No One Will Hear Your Cries | Card Name
trans-unit.source: No One Will Hear Your Cries
trans-unit.target: No One Will Hear Your Cries

trans-unit.resname: OE01·13★ | No One Will Hear Your Cries | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·13★ | No One Will Hear Your Cries | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your companions were lucky to have died first."
trans-unit.target: "Your companions were lucky to have died first."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·14★ | Pay Tribute to Me | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pay Tribute to Me
trans-unit.target: Pay Tribute to Me

trans-unit.resname: OE01·14★ | Pay Tribute to Me | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·15★ | Power Without Equal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Power Without Equal
trans-unit.target: Power Without Equal

trans-unit.resname: OE01·15★ | Power Without Equal | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three nonland cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three nonland cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·16★ | A Reckoning Approaches | Card Name
trans-unit.source: A Reckoning Approaches
trans-unit.target: A Reckoning Approaches

trans-unit.resname: OE01·16★ | A Reckoning Approaches | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·16★ | A Reckoning Approaches | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The gates open to my new era."
trans-unit.target: "The gates open to my new era."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·17★ | There Is No Refuge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: There Is No Refuge
trans-unit.target: There Is No Refuge

trans-unit.resname: OE01·17★ | There Is No Refuge | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·17★ | There Is No Refuge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The dunes smell spilled blood."
trans-unit.target: "The dunes smell spilled blood."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·18★ | This World Belongs to Me | Card Name
trans-unit.source: This World Belongs to Me
trans-unit.target: This World Belongs to Me

trans-unit.resname: OE01·18★ | This World Belongs to Me | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·18★ | This World Belongs to Me | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Little insects, I have created entire worlds and extinguished twice as many."
trans-unit.target: "Little insects, I have created entire worlds and extinguished twice as many."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·19★ | What's Yours Is Now Mine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: What's Yours Is Now Mine
trans-unit.target: What's Yours Is Now Mine

trans-unit.resname: OE01·19★ | What's Yours Is Now Mine | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·19★ | What's Yours Is Now Mine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Vow your allegiance to true power."
trans-unit.target: "Vow your allegiance to true power."

trans-unit.resname: OE01·20★ | When Will You Learn? | Card Name
trans-unit.source: When Will You Learn?
trans-unit.target: When Will You Learn?

trans-unit.resname: OE01·20★ | When Will You Learn? | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·20★ | When Will You Learn? | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't fret, infants. It wouldn't have worked anyway."
trans-unit.target: "Don't fret, infants. It wouldn't have worked anyway."
